header.title: Add groups in team page & Legend repositioning
header.description: With this mod you have the ability to add a group to the team page and legend repositioning taken right out of phpbb 3.1.0-dev and made to work with phpbb 3.0.11.
header.author-notes: Thank phpbb for there awesome code and mike over at http://stargate-portal.com for his help with the umil installer.
